original_text: Because you shove with flank and shoulder, butting all the weak sheep with your horns until you have driven them away,
korean_text: 너희가 옆구리와 어깨로 밀어뜨리고 모든 병든 자를 뿔로 받아 무리를 밖으로 흩어지게 하는도다

sentences.original_text: Because you shove with flank and shoulder,
butting all the weak sheep with your horns
sentences.korean_translation: 모든 약한 양들을 너희 뿔로 받으며

sentences.original_text: until you have driven them away,
